verse:
छन्दांसि यज्ञाः क्रतवो व्रतानि भूतं भव्यं यच्च वेदा वदन्ति।
अस्मान्मायी सृजते विश्वमेतत् तस्मिंश्चान्यो मायया सन्निरुद्धः॥

terms.मायी: the Supreme being with illusionary power (Maya)

meaning: Meaning:The verses (meters), sacrifices, rituals and vows mentioned in the Vedas proclaim about the past and future. The Supreme Being with illusionary power (Maya) creates this universe through us. And we other from the supreme being are under the control of same illusionary power.
